DEMO_319_MSG_010:
̂Have you come to mock me as well!?
ā
DEMO_319_MSG_020: ̂You must've heard that your Resistance pals hid that last "Hope", and came striding in here to claim it, as well... !
DEMO_319_MSG_030:
̂I'll never forgive that damn Lucia... she's turned me into the King of Fools!
ā
DEMO_319_MSG_040:
̂And you... as an ally of the Resistance, and Lucia...
You will pay for her actions!
